snippet.title: FootLOL Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
App Store http://bit.ly/FootLOL-iOS
Mac App Store http://bit.ly/FootLOL-Mac
Desura http://bit.ly/FootLOL-PC

We all love football – but how badly do you want to win? FootLOL lets you use mines, cheats, aliens, cows, guns and many more cheats to decimate the opposing team and protect your players. It’s a funny old game!

Game features:
- Four planets, each with several types of pitch
- Wi-Fi multiplayer
- Hilarious football chaos
- Highly customizable characters and teams
- Sixty levels
- Crazy abilities and tools

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/footlol.epic.fail
Twitter: https://twitter.com/HeroCraft
